DOC.brief_title: Multi-PAP RCT : Improving Prescription Primary Care Patients With Multimorbidity Polypharmacy
DOC.detailed_description: Design : Pragmatic cluster randomize clinical trial 12 month follow-up . Unit randomization : general practitioner . Unit analysis : patient . Setting : Primary Health Care Centres three different Spanish Autonomous Communities ( Aragón , Madrid Andalucía ) . Population : Patients 65-74 year age multimorbidity ( 3 chronic disease ) polypharmacy ( 5 drug take least three month ) . N=400 patient ( 200 arm , 5 patient per physician ) recruit general practitioner randomization . Intervention : complex intervention . Control group : usual care . Variables : MAI , health care utilization , quality life ( Euroqol 5D-5L ) , drug therapy adherence ( Morisky-Green , Haynes-Sackett ) , clinical socio-demographic factor . Economic appraisal variable : time spent training FPs , cost teaching staff , time spend physician-patient interview , utility measure use EuroQol 5D-5L . Analysis : All analysis carry adhere intention-to-treat principle . Description baseline characteristic . Basal comparison group . Analysis main secondary effectiveness ( between-group difference T1-T0 MAI score , correspond CI95 % ) ; multilevel analysis use adjust model . Estimated quality-adjusted life year ( QALYs ) gain population level . Calculation cost-utility ratio .
